% ============================================================
\section{Overview}
% ============================================================

The Mobius Portfolio Reporter automates the transformation of daily NAV report emails into formatted portfolio reports.

\begin{notebox}
\textbf{Already set up?} If you have previously installed the Portfolio Reporter, you only need to replace the \texttt{Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} file in \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash}. Skip to Section 5 (Daily Workflow) for usage instructions.
\end{notebox}

\subsection{What This System Does}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Monitors your Outlook inbox for incoming NAV report emails
    \item Automatically saves Excel attachments to a designated folder
    \item Transforms the data into a formatted portfolio report with Dashboard
    \item Saves the completed report for review
\end{enumerate}

\subsection{Prerequisites}

Before beginning setup, ensure you have:

\begin{itemize}
    \item Microsoft Outlook (desktop application, not "New Outlook")
    \item Microsoft Excel with macro support
    \item Administrator access to your computer (for initial setup only)
\end{itemize}

\newpage

% ============================================================
\section{Installation}
% ============================================================

\subsection{Step 1: Run the Installer}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Locate the file \texttt{INSTALL.bat} in this package
    \item Double-click to run
    \item If prompted by Windows Security, click \textbf{Run anyway}
\end{enumerate}

\begin{notebox}
The installer creates the following folder structure on your C: drive:
\begin{itemize}[noitemsep]
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Incoming} -- where email attachments are saved
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Transformed} -- where completed reports appear
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Archive} -- processed files are moved here
\end{itemize}
\end{notebox}

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[width=0.9\textwidth]{screenshot-folders.png}
\end{center}

\newpage

% ============================================================
\section{Outlook Configuration}
% ============================================================

This section configures Outlook to automatically detect and process incoming NAV report emails.

\subsection{Step 2: Open the VBA Editor}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Open Microsoft Outlook
    \item Press \textbf{Alt + F11} on your keyboard
    \item The Visual Basic for Applications editor will open
\end{enumerate}

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[width=0.95\textwidth]{screenshot-vba-editor.png}
\end{center}

\subsection{Step 3: Locate ThisOutlookSession}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item In the left panel, find \textbf{Microsoft Outlook Objects}
    \item Click the arrow to expand it
    \item Double-click \textbf{ThisOutlookSession}
    \item A blank code window will open on the right
\end{enumerate}

% Screenshot already shown above - ThisOutlookSession visible in left panel

\subsection{Step 4: Paste the Monitor Code}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Open the file \texttt{files\textbackslash OutlookMonitor.txt} from this package
    \item Select all the code (\textbf{Ctrl + A})
    \item Copy the code (\textbf{Ctrl + C})
    \item Click inside the ThisOutlookSession window in Outlook
    \item Paste the code (\textbf{Ctrl + V})
    \item Save (\textbf{Ctrl + S})
    \item Close the VBA Editor
\end{enumerate}

\begin{warningbox}
Make sure you copy ALL of the code from OutlookMonitor.txt. Partial code will cause errors.
\end{warningbox}

\subsection{Step 5: Enable Macros in Outlook}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item In Outlook, click \textbf{File} in the top menu
    \item Click \textbf{Options} (bottom of the left panel)
    \item Click \textbf{Trust Center} (bottom of the list)
    \item Click \textbf{Trust Center Settings...}
    \item Click \textbf{Macro Settings}
    \item Select \textbf{Enable all macros}
    \item Click \textbf{OK} twice to close
    \item \textbf{Restart Outlook completely} (close and reopen)
\end{enumerate}

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[width=0.95\textwidth]{screenshot-trust-center.png}
\end{center}

\newpage

% ============================================================
\section{Testing the System}
% ============================================================

\subsection{Step 6: Verify Installation}

Open File Explorer and confirm these folders exist:

\begin{itemize}
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Incoming}
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Transformed}
    \item \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Archive}
\end{itemize}

Also verify that \texttt{Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} is present in \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash}

\subsection{Step 7: Test with a Sample Email}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Ask a colleague to forward you a recent NAV report email
    \item When the email arrives, Outlook should display a popup: \\\textit{``Mobius Report Monitor is now active''}
    \item The system will automatically:
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Save the Excel attachment to the Incoming folder
        \item Open the Portfolio Transformer
        \item Process the data
        \item Save the result to the Transformed folder
    \end{itemize}
    \item Check \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Transformed} for your output file
\end{enumerate}

\newpage

% ============================================================
\section{Daily Workflow}
% ============================================================

Once configured, the system runs automatically. Your daily workflow is:

\begin{enumerate}
    \item \textbf{Receive Email} -- The Custom daily portfolio report email arrives in your inbox
    \item \textbf{Automatic Processing} -- Outlook detects the email and triggers Excel
    \item \textbf{Review Output} -- The transformed report opens automatically
\end{enumerate}

The output includes a Dashboard tab with charts and KPIs, plus detailed Stocks and Options tabs.

\vspace{0.5cm}

% ============================================================
\section{Troubleshooting}
% ============================================================

\subsection{``Macros have been disabled''}

\begin{itemize}
    \item In Excel: File $\rightarrow$ Options $\rightarrow$ Trust Center $\rightarrow$ Macro Settings $\rightarrow$ Enable all macros
    \item In Outlook: Same path, then restart Outlook
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Emails are not being processed}

\begin{itemize}
    \item Verify the code is pasted in ThisOutlookSession (not a different module)
    \item Confirm macros are enabled in Outlook
    \item Restart Outlook after making any changes
    \item Ensure you're using Classic Outlook (not ``New Outlook'')
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Report not generating}

\begin{itemize}
    \item Check \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash Incoming} for the attachment file
    \item Ensure \texttt{Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} exists in \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports}
    \item Only the Custom daily portfolio report email is required (as of v5.7.0)
\end{itemize}
